sentences: One observer described the US approach to compliance as its 'only green position,' such is its commitment to a robust and rigorous system.

Ultimately the credibility of the compliance system will be bound to the types of consequences and sanctions envisaged, and to the overall rigor of the Protocol mechanisms and their capacity to bring about real reductions in GHG emissions.
enb_long_title: Fifth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
